decks.notes: The deck focuses on controlling the game through powerful planeswalkers like Teferi and Nissa, who can manipulate the board and generate card advantage. It also includes ramp spells like Growth Spiral and Gilded Goose to quickly build up mana for big threats like Hydroid Krasis and Mass Manipulation. Oko provides additional disruption by turning opponent's creatures into elks. The deck aims to stall the game with board wipes like Time Wipe and gain card advantage through powerful spells and creatures to eventually overwhelm the opponent.

This Bant Control deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly and efficiently in order to generate a board state advantage with Field of the Dead and Golos, Tireless Pilgrim. The deck utilizes various guildgates and other land cards to ensure that it consistently hits its land drops and can activate Golos's ability effectively. Teferi, Time Raveler provides disruption and protection, while Realm-Cloaked Giant serves as a board wipe. The deck also includes card draw and lifegain to help stabilize against aggressive strategies, with a sideboard option in Fae of Wishes for additional versatility.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through the use of Fires of Invention to cast powerful spells for free. It combines various planeswalkers like Teferi, Narset, and Sarkhan with board wipes like Deafening Clarion and Time Wipe to control the board state and limit the opponent's options. The deck also includes cards like Fae of Wishes and Drawn from Dreams to search for specific answers or win conditions. The goal is to maintain control of the game while setting up a win condition with powerful planeswalkers and spells.

This deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly with cards like Growth Spiral and Circuitous Route to efficiently play powerful threats like Teferi, Time Raveler, Golos, Tireless Pilgrim, and Hydroid Krasis. The deck aims to control the game by disrupting the opponent's plays with Teferi's abilities and removal spells while generating value with Golos activating Field of the Dead to create a board advantage. The deck also includes a toolbox of lands to ensure consistent mana fixing and provides options for different guildgates to maximize Golos' ability.

The deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana to play powerful threats and disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Oko, Thief of Crowns. It also utilizes creatures with strong synergies like Gilded Goose and Wicked Wolf to generate value and pressure the opponent. With a mix of efficient creatures and powerful planeswalkers, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggression and disruption.

This Bant Control deck aims to have a strong control over the game with a focus on ramping up mana and generating a lot of value through cards like Golos, Tireless Pilgrim and Hydroid Krasis. The deck also heavily relies on Field of the Dead to flood the board with zombie tokens. Teferi, Time Raveler provides additional control elements, while Realm-Cloaked Giant and Agent of Treachery help deal with threats on the opponent's side of the board. Overall, the deck aims to control the game until it can overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats and card advantage.

The deck utilizes Fires of Invention to cast multiple powerful spells for free each turn, controlling the board with cards like Deafening Clarion and Teferi, Time Raveler. Cavalier of Flame and Cavalier of Gales provide strong threats and card advantage. The deck also includes removal spells like Aether Gust and Bonecrusher Giant to deal with opposing threats. The manabase is optimized with a mix of shock lands and temples to ensure consistent mana sources. Overall, the deck aims to control the game and outvalue the opponent to secure victory.

The deck focuses on quickly flooding the board with low-cost creatures like Faerie Guidemother, Law-Rune Enforcer, Loyal Pegasus, and Venerable Knight, supported by anthem effects like Heraldic Banner and Venerated Loxodon to make them more threatening. This aggressive strategy is further enhanced by cards like Raise the Alarm and Tithe Taker, while Gideon Blackblade and Conclave Tribunal provide removal and disruption. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent early on with a relentless stream of small creatures, taking advantage of their numbers to quickly close out the game.

This deck focuses on utilizing the Adventure mechanic to quickly build a board presence while applying pressure to the opponent. By using cards such as Edgewall Innkeeper and Lucky Clover, the player can generate card advantage and maintain momentum. The combination of powerful Adventure creatures like Murderous Rider and Order of Midnight alongside aggressive creatures like Knight of the Ebon Legion and Smitten Swordmaster allows for a fast-paced and resilient aggro strategy. Additionally, the inclusion of Castle Locthwain provides additional card draw and late-game reach, ensuring the deck remains competitive in longer matches.

The deck focuses on utilizing Fires of Invention to cast powerful spells for free, while controlling the game with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Realm-Cloaked Giant. The deck includes a mix of removal spells, card draw, and powerful threats like Cavalier of Flame and Cavalier of Gales to dominate the board and outvalue the opponent. With efficient mana base and card selection, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan and overwhelm them with its powerful spells and creatures.

This deck focuses on utilizing Fires of Invention to cast powerful spells for free, while controlling the board with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Deafening Clarion. The deck aims to establish board presence with Cavalier of Gales and Cavalier of Flame, while drawing into key cards with Drawn from Dreams. Aether Gust provides additional control against opposing spells, while Niv-Mizzet, Parun and Bonecrusher Giant offer additional threats and removal options. Castle Vantress and Temple lands help with fixing mana and ensuring consistent plays.

This deck focuses on quickly putting pressure on the opponent by playing multiple creatures with adventure abilities to generate card advantage and deal consistent damage. The key strategy is to use Lucky Clover to double the effects of adventure spells like Once Upon a Time and Foulmire Knight, while also ramping up with Beanstalk Giant and The Great Henge for extra value. With a mix of strong removal spells and versatile creatures, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a fast victory.

The main idea of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy. It focuses on efficiently deploying creatures like Edgewall Innkeeper, Lovestruck Beast, and Venerated Loxodon, while also using spells like Conclave Tribunal and Unbreakable Formation to control the board and protect its creatures. The deck also includes support cards like Giant Killer and Raise the Alarm to maintain pressure on the opponent. By quickly building a wide board presence and leveraging powerful synergies, this deck aims to dominate the battlefield and secure a swift victory.

The main focus of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to quickly swarm the battlefield with creatures and overwhelm the opponent with early aggression. By utilizing cards like Lovestruck Beast, Giant Killer, and Venerated Loxodon, this deck aims to create a wide board presence while also generating card advantage through Edgewall Innkeeper. With the ability to quickly pump out tokens with March of the Multitudes and buff creatures with spells like Flower / Flourish, this deck can apply pressure early on and maintain board control throughout the match.

The deck focuses on quickly building a wide board presence through low-cost creatures like Faerie Guidemother and Lovestruck Beast, supported by cards like Once Upon a Time to find them. Giant Killer and Conclave Tribunal provide removal options, while Shepherd of the Flock offers protection and versatility. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a fast, aggressive playstyle, maximizing the efficiency of its creatures and using cards like Venerated Loxodon to further boost its board presence. Castle Ardenvale and Trostani Discordant provide additional late-game power and resilience to seal the victory.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan and gaining incremental advantages through powerful planeswalkers and removal spells. It aims to control the board with cards like Thought Erasure and Murderous Rider while generating card advantage with Hydroid Krasis and Nissa, Who Shakes the World. The deck also uses mana ramp cards like Gilded Goose to accelerate into its bigger threats like Garruk, Cursed Huntsman and Oko, Thief of Crowns. By efficiently managing resources and disrupting the opponent's strategy, this Sultai Control deck aims to outvalue and outlast its opponents in a long game.
